Class EnquiryCLI

Object
EnquiryCLI
public class EnquiryCLI extends Object
CLI for managing enquiries submitted by applicants or viewed by HDB staff. Applicants can submit, view, edit, and delete their enquiries. Officers and managers can view and reply to enquiries for their assigned or handled projects.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applicantEnquiryMenu()
    Displays the enquiry menu for applicants.
    void
    deleteEnquiry()
    Prompts the applicant to delete one of their submitted enquiries.
    void
    editEnquiry()
    Prompts the applicant to update the content of an existing enquiry.
    private void
    getAllEnquiries()
    Displays all enquiries in the system (for managers).
    void
    managerEnquiryMenu()
    Displays the manager enquiry menu options.
    private void
    replyToEnquiry()
    Prompts the staff user to reply to a selected enquiry.
    void
    showApplicantLoop()
    Menu loop for applicants to submit or manage their enquiries.
    private void
    staffMenuLoop()
    Menu loop for managers to view and reply to enquiries.
    void
    start()
    Starts the enquiry management interface.
    void
    submitEnquiry()
    Allows the applicant to submit a new enquiry for an open and visible project.
    private void
    viewEnquiriesForStaff()
    Displays enquiries for the officer's assigned project or all projects managed by the manager.
    void
    viewMyEnquiries()
    Displays all enquiries submitted by the applicant and allows edit or delete actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryCLI

      public EnquiryCLI(User user, EnquiryController enquiryController, Breadcrumb breadcrumb)
      Constructs the EnquiryCLI with the current user and required controller.
      Parameters:
      user - The logged-in user (Applicant, Officer, or Manager).
      enquiryController - The controller used to manage enquiry logic.
      breadcrumb - Breadcrumb tracker for navigation path display.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the enquiry management interface. Routes based on user role (applicant or staff).

    • showApplicantLoop

      public void showApplicantLoop()
      Menu loop for applicants to submit or manage their enquiries.

    • applicantEnquiryMenu

      public void applicantEnquiryMenu()
      Displays the enquiry menu for applicants.

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry()
      Allows the applicant to submit a new enquiry for an open and visible project.

    • viewMyEnquiries

      public void viewMyEnquiries()
      Displays all enquiries submitted by the applicant and allows edit or delete actions.

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry()
      Prompts the applicant to update the content of an existing enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry()
      Prompts the applicant to delete one of their submitted enquiries.

    • staffMenuLoop

      private void staffMenuLoop()
      Menu loop for managers to view and reply to enquiries.

    • managerEnquiryMenu

      public void managerEnquiryMenu()
      Displays the manager enquiry menu options.

    • getAllEnquiries

      private void getAllEnquiries()
      Displays all enquiries in the system (for managers).

    • viewEnquiriesForStaff

      private void viewEnquiriesForStaff()
      Displays enquiries for the officer's assigned project or all projects managed by the manager. Allows reply to individual enquiries.

    • replyToEnquiry

      private void replyToEnquiry()
      Prompts the staff user to reply to a selected enquiry.
